p: To our knowledge, this is the first prospective study assessing clinical characteristics and outcome, risk factors, and incidence of symptomatic COVID-19 in a large cohort of PLWH. During the COVID-19 epidemics in Barcelona (Spain), approximately 1% of PLWH sought help for clinical symptoms suggestive of COVID-19. Although the vast majority of them had COVID-19 confirmed, 15% had other causes that may also affect PLWH.
